sentences.en: A goal is only a goal if it is measurable.
sentences.cn: 目标只有能够被衡量才称得上是目标.

sentences.en: Both leaders seemed to expect measurable progress.
sentences.cn: 两位领导人似乎都期望取得显著的进展。

sentences.en: Econometrics deals with measurable and measured quantities in economics.
sentences.cn: 计量经济学的对象是经济学中可测量和已测出的量.

sentences.en: Economists emphasize measurable quantities — the number of jobs, the per capita income.
sentences.cn: 经济学家看重的是可测定的量——岗位数量、人均收入等。

sentences.en: It does tell us almost everything we need to know about the measurable properties of atoms.
sentences.cn: 它确实能够告诉我们几乎所有我们需要知道的原子的可测性质.

sentences.en: Maxwell's field equations described this measurable disturbance of the medium without explicitly discussing the ether itself.
sentences.cn: 麦克斯韦电磁场方程描写了媒质的这种可测量的扰动,而不去详细讨论以太本身.

sentences.en: Measurable effects on body chemical processes occur only after prolonged malnutrition.
sentences.cn: 只有长期营养不良才会明显影响人体化学变化的过程.

sentences.en: So far the effect is barely measurable.
sentences.cn: 迄今为止，效果微乎其微。

sentences.en: The ground grows layer appropriate deep, measurable and wet.
sentences.cn: 地栽土层宜深厚, 适度湿润.

sentences.en: The linearization ofnonlinear system with measurable disturbances is studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了一类具有可测干扰的非线性系统的线性化问题.

sentences.en: The quality objectives shall be measurable and consistent with the quality policy.
sentences.cn: 质量目标应包含符合产品要求所需之内容.

sentences.en: The simulation results show measurable improvement in both queue length and throughput.
sentences.cn: 仿真结果显示算法在队列长度以及吞吐量方面都取得了不错的效果.

sentences.en: There are measurable changes in human performance.
sentences.cn: 人的行为具有可测出的变化.

sentences.en: These quantities are not in general physically measurable.
sentences.cn: 一般这些量是不能实际测定的.

sentences.en: What are some good examples of a measurable goal?
sentences.cn: 哪些算得上是可衡量的目标 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 量过的；慎重的；基于标准的；有规则的
可以测定的程度；可视地
测量；[计量] 度量；尺寸；量度制
[测] 测量器；[测] 测量员

trans.tran_cn: 可量度的，可测量的，可预见的，重大的
